thread.section_title: Mercure Paris Montparnasse Raspail - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Price & Location
thread.title_full: Good Price & Location - Review of Mercure Paris Montparnasse Raspail, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Katie W
title: Good Price & Location
text: We really enjoyed our 4-night stay at the Mercure on Raspail. Comfortable and clean room with a really nice street view. Close walk to two Metro stops: Raspail (Green+Magenta Lines) and Vavin (Magenta Line). Tons of dining nearby. Luxemborg Gardens a short walk. It was a little loud at night, but I don't know if there's much avoiding those Paris sirens if you stay on a busy street. We enjoyed the Montparnasse area. We did not spend much time in our room, so this small but clean hotel was perfect.
